backend/main.mo: Defines core actor data types for users, documents, financial records, compliance items, and various system entities used throughout the backend.
feature_evidence.json: Describes a feature requirement ensuring a specific user is always treated as a Super Admin, listing impacted files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregates short summaries of numerous frontend files, describing their roles in routing, UI, hooks, permissions, and data handling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes with custom color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx and sets metadata and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, authentication gating, profile setup flow, and global layout with backend health checks.
frontend/src/auth/permissions.ts: Defines capabilities per business role and utilities to check permissions and determine visible modules.
frontend/src/auth/roles.ts: Defines business roles and provides a normalizer that maps extendedRole strings to valid roles.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserManage: Renders a permission-gated user management page with navigation, user list placeholder, and invite button.
frontend/src/components/auth/PermissionG: Generic wrapper that conditionally renders or disables children based on capability checks from usePermissions.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for collecting and saving user profile details including name, email, department, and role.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Sign‑in screen using Internet Identity with error display and fallback logo handling.
frontend/src/components/bulk-upload/Bulk: Bulk upload UI for selecting, parsing, validating, and importing files with sample download support.
frontend/src/components/bulk-upload/bulk: Shared types defining bulk upload config, import summary, and parsed row exports.
frontend/src/components/calendar/AddDead: Dialog for creating regulatory deadlines with title, description, due date, and category fields.
frontend/src/components/calendar/Deadlin: Displays deadlines grouped by month with overdue highlighting and status/category badges.
Tabular list of deadlines with sorting, overdue marking, and ability to update submission status.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientsT: Displays a scrollable table of client records with basic details and document counts.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientUp: Modal form for creating or editing a client with PAN validation and submission via useCreateClient.
frontend/src/components/common/AppErrorB: React error boundary that catches fatal errors and displays a fallback screen with reload option.
frontend/src/components/common/AppFatalE: Full‑page error screen showing error info, troubleshooting steps, and a reload button.
frontend/src/components/common/BackendEr: Banner for displaying backend errors, with special handling for authorization issues.
frontend/src/components/common/BackendHe: Alert banner shown when backend is unreachable, offering a retry button.
frontend/src/components/common/EmptyStat: Generic empty‑state component with optional illustration and action slot.
frontend/src/components/margin/Collatera: Renders collateral records in a table, including security details and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/reconciliation/R: Lists reconciliation runs sorted by upload date with status and a view‑details action.
frontend/src/components/reconciliation/S: Dialog that displays up to 100 statement rows for a reconciliation run with date and amounts.
frontend/src/components/reports/ReportTe: Grid of report templates with category badges and a button to select a template.
frontend/src/features/bulk-upload/client: Validates parsed client upload rows and converts them into BulkClient objects, collecting row-level errors.
frontend/src/features/bulk-upload/collat: Validates collateral upload rows, converts them into CollateralRecord objects, and returns results with errors.
frontend/src/features/bulk-upload/margin: Validates margin snapshot rows and converts them into MarginSnapshot objects with error tracking.
frontend/src/features/bulk-upload/reconc: Validates reconciliation statement rows and converts them into StatementRow objects with error reporting.
frontend/src/features/reports/reportTemp: Defines report data requirements and maps backend data into formatted report rows for different template types.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealthCheck: Runs periodic backend health checks using the current actor and exposes health status.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches and exposes the current user's profile using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/usePermissions.ts: Derives user role from profile and exposes permission checks and visible modules based on capabilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user, client, document, and dashboard-related backend data using an actor instance.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and a custom slate-themed color system with utility classes and dense table styling.
frontend/src/layout/DashboardLayout.tsx: Provides the main dashboard layout with sidebar navigation, user menu, profile refresh, and logout handling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
Displays audit log entries with search, export permission control, error handling, and a table view.
frontend/src/pages/clients/ClientManagem: Provides client search, CRUD modal, bulk upload handling, and tabbed navigation for client data and upload actions.
frontend/src/pages/compliance/Regulatory: Shows regulatory deadlines in list or calendar views with add-deadline controls and permission gating.
frontend/src/pages/config/ConfigurationH: Home page for configuration modules linking to exchange settings, user management, and integrations, gated by permissions.
frontend/src/pages/config/ExchangeSettin: Displays exchange configuration placeholder content with navigation back and permission restriction.
frontend/src/pages/config/IntegrationsPa: Shows integration settings with a notice about unavailable email integrations and a placeholder config section.
frontend/src/pages/data-entry/components: React form for entering manual trades with validation, session-stored trade list, and removal support.
frontend/src/pages/data-entry/tradeImpor: Defines manual trade entry types and validation logic, including required fields and numeric checks.
Parses CSV trade import files using a shared parser and returns structured row data or errors.
Validates parsed CSV trade rows and converts them into Trade objects, enforcing required fields and value rules.
frontend/src/pages/data-entry/TradeImpor: Handles trade CSV upload, parsing, validation, import workflow, manual entry option, and trade history display.
frontend/src/pages/HowToUseGuidePage.tsx: Renders a detailed instructional guide explaining platform features, roles, and onboarding steps.
frontend/src/pages/margin/MarginCollater: Page for uploading and viewing margin snapshots and collateral data with validation and permissions.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Displays a styled 404 page with a button redirecting users back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/OverviewPage.tsx: Shows dashboard metrics, a link to the usage guide, and key compliance statistics using permission-aware UI.
frontend/src/pages/reconciliation/BankRe: Bank reconciliation page handling statement uploads, validation, run history, and viewing statement rows.
frontend/src/pages/reports/ReportLibrary: Report library UI enabling search, browsing templates, and navigating to report generation features.
frontend/src/pages/reports/ReportWizardP: Implements a wizard UI for selecting a report template, validating required data, generating a report, and exporting it as CSV.
frontend/src/pages/reports/ScheduledRepo: Displays scheduled report automation UI with an empty state and option to create new schedules based on permissions.
frontend/src/pages/surveillance/Surveill: Shows surveillance alert statistics and tabbed views with empty states for various alert categories.
frontend/src/utils/backendError.ts: Normalizes backend errors into user-friendly messages and logs technical details, including schema error detection.
frontend/src/utils/bulkUploadFileParsing: Provides CSV file parsing utilities, including header extraction, row parsing, and basic format validation with fallback errors.
Contains generic validation helpers for bulk upload rows, including required columns, number checks, and date validation.
frontend/src/utils/export.ts: Exports data to CSV or JSON files by generating downloadable blobs in the browser.
frontend/src/utils/sampleDownloads.ts: Safely downloads sample CSV files and guards against accidental HTML fallback responses.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/validation/pan.ts: Defines a regex for validating PAN numbers and exports a function that tests input strings against it.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with typography, container queries, and custom themes including colors, fonts, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and admin‑rights feature requests for the project state.
